body_html: Thanks for the idea. This is useful, but one problem I see is that it introduces a dependency of tensorflow on tensorboard, which we do not allow. One solution would be to port the plugin into tensorflow/contrib/tensorboard/plugins so we need the opinion of the tensorboard people. If this works and it does not break existing pipelines, it would be a good contribution.

body: Thanks for the idea. This is useful, but one problem I see is that it introduces a dependency of tensorflow on tensorboard, which we do not allow. One solution would be to port the plugin into tensorflow/contrib/tensorboard/plugins so we need the opinion of the tensorboard people. If this works and it does not break existing pipelines, it would be a good contribution.
